item.description:
Monsters vs. Aliens: An IMAX 3D Experience (2009)

Show time is 4:30 PM . Let's meet in the lobby around 4:15 PM. This will give us plenty of time to get our tickets, snack and find a seat.

Starring:: Reese Witherspoon, Seth Rogen, Hugh Laurie, Will Arnett and Kiefer Sutherland.

Synopsis: When a meteorite from outer space hits a young girl and turns her into a giant monster, she is taken to a secret government compound where she meets a ragtag group of monsters also rounded up over the years.

Genres: Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi
Running Time: 94 min.
MPAA Rating: Rated PG for sci-fi action, some crude humor and mild language.

Trailer Clip
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Meet-up pin.
item.name: FAN Flick
